statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY registered_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT customer_name, registered_at FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY registered_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE registered_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT t.transaction_date, t.amount, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;

SELECT sa.activity_date, sa.activity_description, t.amount FROM suspicious_activities sa JOIN transactions t ON sa.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE sa.activity_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY sa.activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT activity_description, transaction_id FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE customers.name LIKE 'A%'

SELECT customers.name, activity_logs.log_details FROM customers JOIN suspicious_activities ON customers.customer_id = suspicious_activities.activity_id JOIN activity_logs ON suspicious_activities.activity_id = activity_logs.activity_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT customer_name, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id WHERE state = 'CA';
